term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - fusion in biotechnology
term.title: fusion

item.text: The amalgamation of two distinct cells or macromolecules into a single integrated unit.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 154 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
